definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
"three public expenditures" of the PRC government, i.e. air travel, food and entertainment, and public vehicles

sentences.english: Wheather more money will be forthcoming is an open question.
sentences.chinese: 是否會有更多經費尚未確定。

sentences.english: However, there is no budget for it.
sentences.chinese: 可是府庫裏沒有這筆經費。

sentences.english: The society was not even in funds to pay its out of pocket disbursements.
sentences.chinese: 該社團甚至沒有經費應付日常開支。

sentences.english: Unifying all accounting subjects of science and technology expenditure.
sentences.chinese: 二是儘量統一各類科技計劃的經費預決算科目。

sentences.english: Do you want to save for your kids’ college education?
sentences.chinese: 是否打算爲孩子存下上大學的教育經費？

sentences.english: The higher educational funds assignment pattern has great influence on the students enrollment policy.
sentences.chinese: 高等教育經費分配模式對招生政策具有決定性的影響。

sentences.english: This trip is out of my budget by a few dollars.
sentences.chinese: 這次旅行經費超出我的預算幾美元。

sentences.english: VII. The award scheme is covered by the NCKU English Eagle Project.
sentences.chinese: 本獎勵經費由頂尖大學成英計畫經費項下支付。

sentences.english: VII. The award scheme is covered by the NCKU English Eagle Project.
sentences.chinese: 本獎勵經費由頂尖大學成英計畫經費項下支付。

sentences.english: The city council brought down the new spending plans yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天市參議會正式公佈了新的經費開銷計劃。

sentences.english: The money will be given to local scientists who are developing age-defying technologies.
sentences.chinese: 這筆經費將交給當地研發抗老科技的科學家。

sentences.english: No, I didn't get any subvention from Taiwan's government this year.
sentences.chinese: □否，本年度未獲任何經費補助。

sentences.english: Too much ADB money is still channeled toward fossil fuel energy.
sentences.chinese: 亞銀有太多經費投注在石化能源業。

sentences.english: Many states now spend more money on prisons than on education.
sentences.chinese: 現在許多州在監獄上的花費比教育經費還多。

sentences.english: Pointed out:main difficult position of scientific and technical periodicals were the sunds short of supplies of run a newspaper in present stage.
sentences.chinese: 指出當前科技期刊面臨的主要困境是辦刊經費匱乏。

sentences.english: Inquired into the measure increased economy benefit, settle a way out for sunds difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 探討了提高經濟效益的措施，解決經費困難的出路。
